name: Defending Fort Kenstone
description:
Defending Fort Kenstone is a No-Rails Tower Defence Game.

Defend your Castle and survive 35 waves of differing enemies by building towers, dropping bombs to empowering yourself with various upgrades. 

  • Choose from 59 upgrades to empower yourself, your bombs and your towers
  • Build 4 different types of towers to destroy your enemies
  • Battle up to 20 different enemies
  • Survive up to 35 different waves of enemies
